favourite.article: Amen! Limit, Lord, my independence, Let me to Thy Body turn; Not just seeking light from heaven, But the church’s sense to learn. May we be the stones for building Not the formless, useless clay, Gain in us Thy heart’s desire Corporately Thyself display.
O Lord Jesus, unveil us continually to see that to know You as the Body is our desperate need today!
Thank You Lord, for Your Body! May we know You more as the Body!
